name: Ponychan - Vinyl Trance Theme
description:
A Ponychan theme based on the best background pony ever, Vinyl Scratch (A.K.A. DJ PON-3 or just plain Scratch). Easy on the eyes, shades of white and blue with a sweet background make this theme stand out in the crowd.
The 100kb pictures here can't do this theme justice, try it and see.
